title: Graston Technique CEU System
summary: Built a comprehensive continuing education system that transformed the provider experience and reduced support burden while increasing conversions.
problem: Healthcare providers struggled with a fragmented CEU purchasing process, leading to high support ticket volume and checkout abandonment. The existing system couldn't handle the complexity of continuing education credits across multiple states and specializations.
strategy: Redesigned the entire CEU ecosystem with focus on user experience, automated compliance checking, and seamless payment processing. Implemented a CRM-driven approach that could handle complex credential validation and state-specific requirements.
execution: Architected 400+ automation workflows using FluentCRM and WP Fusion
Integrated LearnDash LMS with WooCommerce for seamless course delivery
Built custom state-specific compliance validation system
Implemented multi-tier pricing with automatic credit allocation
Created automated email sequences for certificate generation and delivery
Integrated with external credential verification APIs

metrics.label: Checkout Conversion Lift
metrics.description: Streamlined user experience and payment flow

title: Riley Bennett Egloff Brand & Digital Overhaul
summary: Complete brand repositioning and digital presence overhaul for a prestigious law firm, focusing on trust-building and client acquisition through strategic storytelling and modern web experience.
problem: Established law firm with traditional marketing approach was losing market share to younger, digitally-savvy competitors. Their website and branding felt dated, and they struggled to communicate their expertise to both individual and corporate clients.
strategy: Developed a trust-first brand strategy that positioned the firm as both traditional excellence and modern innovation. Created content hub focusing on legal insights, case studies, and thought leadership while improving user experience for both individual and corporate clients.
execution: Complete brand identity refresh with modern, trustworthy aesthetic
Rebuilt website with improved case study presentation
Implemented content marketing strategy for SEO and thought leadership
Created client portal for case updates and document sharing
Launched targeted LinkedIn campaign for corporate clients
Optimized for local search and professional service rankings

metrics.label: Organic Search Traffic
metrics.description: Increased through content strategy and SEO

title: Ultimate Technologies ROI Growth
summary: Complete overhaul of paid advertising strategy for IT services company, focusing on ROI optimization and lead quality improvement across multiple channels.
problem: IT services company was spending significantly on paid advertising but seeing poor lead quality and inconsistent ROI. Their campaigns were broad and unfocused, leading to high cost-per-lead and low conversion rates.
strategy: Implemented account-based marketing (ABM) approach with laser-focused targeting, improved ad creative testing, and sophisticated lead scoring to ensure sales team only receives high-quality prospects.
execution: Restructured Google Ads campaigns with negative keyword strategy
Launched LinkedIn ABM campaigns for enterprise clients
Implemented advanced conversion tracking with offline data
Created custom landing pages for different service lines
Established lead scoring models for sales prioritization
Set up automated bidding and budget optimization
